author: entertainment.ie
title: Festival News | Photos: The hmv Supporting Irish Film party at the Galway Film Fleadh
text:
John C. Reilly swug by the annual hmv Supporting Irish Film party at the Galway Film Fleadh over the weekend, confirming he is signed on for Wreck-It Ralph 2 .
The party, which continues to be one of the most sought-after invitations of the Galway Film Fleadh, took place in the Veranda Terrace & Bar at the Radisson Blu Hotel in Galway, with live performances and exclusive DJ sets from special guests, HamsandwicH and Keywest.
In his role as host, Hilco Capital CEO, Paul McGowan welcomed some of the brightest stars from the Irish Film Industry, along with the much-loved comic actor John C. Reilly. hmv celebrated their second year as main sponsors of the Galway Film Fleadh, which finished on Sunday.
Check out the photos from the event below.
MORE: John C. Reilly confirms at Galway Film Fleadh that he's signed on for Wreck-It Ralph 2
MORE: HamsandwicH play an acoustic set outside hmv Galway for the Supporting Irish Film party
MORE: John C. Reilly's headed to this year's Galway Film Fleadh
